rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Each digit outside the grid is the digit in the Xth cell in the corresponding direction where X is the digit in the first cell in that direction.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each digit outside the grid is the digit in the Xth cell in the corresponding direction where X is the digit in the first cell in that direction.
